localize.text: Agony and rage mixed, blending together in the mist. One couldn't determine if the smoke was responsible for the madness, or if the cries of agony emitted the smoke.
Great! now I can really see what a jack of all trades can do.
To be frank, I thought I was pretty great too.
But now, watching you makes me think I was a bit full of myself.
Would it be alright if I helped you?
I think I would make a suitable assistant.
It’s good that you’re up again.
It is my honor to be part of a project with a scholar I respect.
You're actually not okay at all, are you?
If a ray of sunlight breaks your heart and collapses your mind with yearning and nostalgia.
And seeing plants outside evokes an unknown rage, tearing down your rational thought.
Then we have no choice but to stay underground.
Let’s start anew, the Corporation that mourns her.
